description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. House of Spice is 3D arcade shooting game. Shooting monsters with spice gun at 4 different fresh locations. Beware of monsters shooting you back since it decreases life point. Collect Old Spice to increase life point.
description.short: House of Spice is 3D arcade shooting game. Shooting monsters with spice gun at 4 different fresh locations. Beware of monsters shooting you back since it decreases life point. Collect Old Spice to increase life point.
